meanings.definition: A medical doctor who specializes in the study and treatment of blood disorders.
meanings.sent1: The hematologists at the hospital are experts in treating blood diseases.
meanings.sent2: My cousin wants to become a hematologist to help people with blood disorders.
meanings.sent3: Why did the vampire go to the hematologists? To get his blood checked!
meanings.sent4: The hematologists are like detectives, investigating mysteries hidden in our blood.
meanings.sent5: The hematologists' dedication to understanding blood disorders is truly admirable.

meanings.definition: The branch of medicine that deals with the study and treatment of blood disorders.
meanings.sent1: Learning about hematologists in school made me interested in blood disorders.
meanings.sent2: Hematologists play a crucial role in diagnosing and treating various blood conditions.
meanings.sent3: The party theme was 'hematologists' night out' - everyone dressed as blood cells!
meanings.sent4: In the world of medicine, hematologists are the unsung heroes battling blood-related illnesses.
meanings.sent5: The advancements in technology have greatly improved the work of hematologists in recent years.
